feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vRealize Operations (vRops) maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 19, 08:00 UTC  -  Jan 22, 20:00 UTC

Dec 30, 18:05 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on Managed vSphere offer.
This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 19/01/2026 08:00 UTC
End time : 22/01/2026 20:00 UTC
Service impact : vRops will be unavailable during the maintenance.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vRealize Operations (vRops).

entry.title: [RBX8][Managed vSphere] - Rack R806L20/21 incident notification
entry.content:
Dec 29, 02:10 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Managed vSphere on the specific racks R806L20/21 has been resolved.

Start time : 29/12/2025 01:45 UTC
End time : 29/12/2025 02:19 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts in racks R806L20/21 were temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers were temporarily unable to access and use their hosts located in the specified racks.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [LIM][Managed vSphere] - Network incident notification

Monitoring - Service has been fully restored since 23/12/2025 23:01 UTC. Monitoring remains active to ensure long-term stability.

Impacted Service(s) : Hosts in LIM were temporarily unreachable.
Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access and use their hosts located in LIM.

entry.title: [RBX8][Managed VMware Cloud Director] - Rack R807L25 - R807L26 incident notification
entry.content:
Dec 21, 13:08 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Managed VMware Cloud Director has been resolved.

Start time : 21/12/2025 06:55 UTC
End time : 21/12/2025 09:30 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Dec 21, 09:18 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Most of the hosts are now operational again.
Ongoing Actions : Our team is working on the remaining hosts.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Dec 21, 07:05 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our VMware Private Cloud offering, which is causing temporary availability issues in the rack R807L25 and R807L26 in RBX8.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 21/12/2025 06:55 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access their hosts located on the specified rack.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [BHS][Managed vSphere] - vSphere maintenance notification
entry.content:
Dec 19, 19:36 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Dec 16, 09:50 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 16, 09:44 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer.

Start time : 16/12/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 19/12/2025 20:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere will not be accessible and the hosts will be put into maintenance mode during the operation.
If the host has virtual machines in it, a vMotion will be performed.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Managed vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

entry.title: [ERI1][Managed VMware Cloud Director] - Racks E104A01 - E104A02 incident notification
entry.content:
Dec 11, 12:06 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Managed VMware Cloud Director offer has been resolved.

Start time : 11/12/2025 09:50 UTC
End time : 11/12/2025 11:58 UTC
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Dec 11, 11:05 UTC
Identified - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : All servers in the Rack E104A01 are available.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Dec 11, 10:05 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Managed VMware Cloud Director offer in ERI1, racks E104A01 and E104A02.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 11/12/2025 09:50 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Public and private server interfaces have lost network access in the specified racks.
Customers Impact : Customers are unable to access their public and private interfaces for their servers located in the specified racks.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
